message: 🚨 HIGH PRIORITY: V2 STANDARDS UPDATED! NEW LINE LIMITS: 300 target, 350 maximum (was 200). QUALITY FOCUS: Maintain code quality, avoid artificial line cutting. FLEXIBILITY: 50-line buffer when needed for proper implementation. IMMEDIATE ACTIONS: Update all task requirements to use 300/350 line limits, continue package-based refactoring, maintain high code quality standards, no artificial line cutting from 309 to 300. ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT AND PROCEED WITH UPDATED STANDARDS!
